mapper.update: update t_address set address_receiver=#{addressReceiver}, address_phone=#{addressPhone}, address_province=#{addressProvince}, address_city=#{addressCity}, address_area=#{addressArea}, address_address=#{addressAddress} where address_id=#{addressId} and address_userid=#{addressUserid}
mapper.select: select address_id as addressId, address_receiver as addressReceiver, address_phone as addressPhone, address_province as addressProvince, address_city as addressCity, address_area as addressArea, address_address as addressAddress from t_address where address_userid=#{0}
mapper.delete: delete from t_address where address_id=#{0} and address_userid=#{1}
